DOC.brief_summary: Berry component show influence cancer process cell culture study . The investigator conduct study investigate blackberry influence cancer process human feed study .
DOC.criteria: Nonsmoking men woman Aged 4075 BMI 1938 kg/m2 Younger 40 ear old old 75 year old BMI le 19 great 38 Use bloodthinning medication warfarin , dicumarol , anisinidione Presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , certain cancer , untreated thyroid , gastrointestinal , metabolic disease malabsorption syndromes Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin Fasting triglyceride great 300 mg/dL Fasting glucose great 126 mg/dL History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g . vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) Use prescription overthecounter antiobesity medication supplement least 6 month prior start study history surgical intervention obesity Active cardiovascular disease Use tobacco product past 6 month Use oral IV antibiotic month precede study study Unwillingness abstain vitamin , mineral , herbal supplement two week prior start study Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction blackberry gelatin Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
